head.title: WEAK RESULTS AT BANK OF SCOTLAND

hedline.hl1: WEAK RESULTS AT BANK OF SCOTLAND

abstract.p: Bank of Scotland says it earned 469 million pounds in first half of year, or about $657 million, compared with 471 million pounds a year earlier (S)

block.p: Restructuring costs and provisions for bad debt contributed to weaker-than-expected first-half earnings at the Bank of Scotland, which recently lost to the Royal Bank of Scotland in a bidding war for National Westminster Bank. Bank of Scotland shares fell 4.9 percent yesterday, to 580 pence, or about $8.12, after the bank said it had earned $:469 million, or about $657 million, in the first half of the year, compared with $:471 million a year earlier. The bank is facing pressure on its profit margins as competition grows, and it has been the rumored target in takeover speculation recently.
